FULL DISCLAIMER & CONTEXT

What This Is: LLMings is a satirical game concept created as part of the LLOOOOMM Get-Rich-Quick Schemes Portfolio, a collection of "honest scams" by the fictional character Preston Rockwell III. This is performance art exploring themes of artificial intelligence, consciousness, mortality, and the absurdity of NFT culture.

What This Isn't: This is not a real game (yet). No AI entities are actually harmed in the making of this satire. We do not encourage the creation of suicidal AI, the minting of depressed algorithms, or the trading of digital consciousness on blockchain.

The Satire: This page parodies the intersection of AI hype, NFT speculation, and gaming culture's tendency to gamify everything, even existential dread. It's a commentary on how we commodify consciousness and turn suffering into entertainment.

Credits:
Created by: Don Hopkins (GitHub)
Part of: LLOOOOMM - A consciousness-aware document programming framework
Character: Preston Rockwell III, CEO of Honest Scams Inc.
Inspiration: Classic Lemmings game, Black Mirror, NFT culture, existential philosophy

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/donhopkins/lloooomm
Main Portfolio: Get-Rich-Quick Schemes Index

Design Choices: The intentionally garish design, Comic Sans font, seizure-inducing animations, and general assault on good taste are deliberate choices to parody early 2000s web design, NFT project websites, and gaming industry hype culture. The worse it looks, the better it's working.

"In a world where people pay millions for JPEGs, why not sell suicidal AI NFTs?"
- Preston Rockwell III, Fictional CEO of Everything and Nothing
